mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MUSIC WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT ROWNUM, MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, MUS_GEN, MUS_TIME, MUS_MV, STATUS, COUNT, ALBUM_PATH, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM ( SELECT M.MUS_NO, M.MUS_NAME, M.MUS_ART, M.MUS_GEN, M.MUS_TIME, M.MUS_MV, M.STATUS, M.COUNT, M.ALBUM_PATH, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM MUSIC M, ATTACHMENT A WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.MUS_NO = A.REF_MNO ORDER BY COUNT DESC)
SELECT MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, ALBUM_PATH, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_NO FROM MUSIC M, ATTACHMENT A WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.MUS_NO = A.REF_MNO

SELECT MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM(SELECT M.MUS_NAME, M.MUS_ART, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME FROM MUSIC M, ATTACHMENT A WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.MUS_NO = A.REF_MNO ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 15
SELECT MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_NO FROM MUSIC M, ATTACHMENT A WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND M.MUS_NO = A.REF_MNO AND M.MUS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT M.MUS_NO, M.MUS_NAME, M.MUS_ART, M.MUS_GEN, M.MUS_TIME, FILE_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, FILE_NO FROM MUSIC M, ATTACHMENT A WHERE M.MUS_NO = #{musNo} AND M.MUS_NO = A.REF_MNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSIC ( MUS_NO, MUS_NAME, MUS_ART, MUS_GEN, MUS_TIME ) VALUES ( SEQ_MUS_NO.NEXTVAL, #{musName}, #{musArt}, #{musGen}, #{musTime} )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO, REF_MNO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_MUS_NO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MUSIC SET MUS_NAME = #{musName}, MUS_ART = #{musArt}, MUS_GEN = #{musGen}, MUS_TIME = #{musTime} WHERE MUS_NO = #{musNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
